name: CKXC: Cobra Kai Cross Country Episode 2
name_original: CKXC: Cobra Kai Cross Country Episode 2
description: Strike First. Strike Hard. No Mercy. These are the words emblazoned onto the hearts of every Cobra Kai member, and the words that you, Miguel, soon grow to learn as you run through every obstacle in your path. Find love, defeat your enemies, and most of all, become a badass in this browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game.
